TopicTitle: Infernal Robotic Surface Probe to Minmus

Articles.Content:
Hey, I started a new career so this is my "first" probe to Minmus but I used some basic Infernal Robotics. Nothing compared to what ive seen others do but it was fun!

In Orbit around Kerbin:

![2z7h7ba.png](http://i60.tinypic.com/2z7h7ba.png)

Arriving at Minmus:

![2lmuceg.png](http://i57.tinypic.com/2lmuceg.png)

Probe detaching from Transfer Stage

![2wd0ob9.png](http://i58.tinypic.com/2wd0ob9.png)

Robot Legs Deployed:

![35jea79.png](http://i57.tinypic.com/35jea79.png)

Landed with Robotic Solar Panel thing!:

![20f6m4k.png](http://i57.tinypic.com/20f6m4k.png)

Think ill have lots of fun with IR!
